name: eWeapons Gun Weapon Simulator (lisaweby)
description:
This is surely one of the most amusing gun simulator games which offers a unique experience to everyone who enjoys shooting. In this particular gun simulator, which is also a revolver simulator and a machine gun simulator, you have a variety of weapons such as: revólver, rifle, pistola, machine gun, which look just like their real world counterparts. This gun app is perfect for those who would like to learn how to handle a pistol and many other firearms while being completely safe.

eWeapons Guns Weapon Simulator is one of those gun shooting games where you will feel like you are holding a real pistol in your hands and when you hear the gun sounds, you will get the impression like you are in a real shooting range.

Inside the eWeapons™ Ultimate Weapon Simulator app, you have a possibility to play a fantastic mini game – shooting range game. We have prepared for you a gun shooting range game. This is a first person shooting game where you select your weapon, shoot targets and pass up to another level. You will definitely enjoy this FPS game, which will make you feel like a professional shooter.

Features of eWeapons™ Guns Weapons Simulator:

huge selection of weapons

authentic weapon mechanics

realistic gun sounds

high resolution graphic

realistic fire and smoke

realistic recoil effects

unlimited ammo

gun slow motion

camera flash

great game music
